languages.text: Тяжелое тело мон-кай припечатывает меня к земле. Сустав нижней конечности давит реактивный ускоритель, словно скорлупу. Разъяренно клекоча, я освобождаюсь от хватки и отскакиваю. По спине расползается неприятная слабость — повреждено что-то важное.

The mon-keigh's heavy body pins me to the ground. The joint of its lower limb crushes the jet booster like an eggshell. I break free of the grip and dash away with an angry shriek. Unpleasant weakness creeps up my spine: something vital has been damaged.
languages.original_text: Тяжелое тело мон-кай припечатывает меня к земле. Сустав нижней конечности давит реактивный ускоритель, словно скорлупу. Разъяренно клекоча, я освобождаюсь от хватки и отскакиваю. По спине расползается неприятная слабость — повреждено что-то важное.

traits.locale_text: The mon-keigh's heavy body pins me to the ground. The joint of its lower limb crushes the jet booster like an eggshell. I break free of the grip and dash away with an angry shriek. A nasty weakness creeps up my spine — something important has been damaged.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: モン＝ケイの重い体が私を地面に押し付ける。下肢の関節が、卵の殻のようにジェットブースターを押し潰す。私はその手を振りほどき、怒号とともにダッシュで逃げ出した。背筋に不快な脱力感が走る。何か重要な部分が損傷を受けたらしい。
languages.original_text: The mon-keigh's heavy body pins me to the ground. The joint of its lower limb crushes the jet booster like an eggshell. I break free of the grip and dash away with an angry shriek. Unpleasant weakness creeps up my spine: something vital has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: モン＝ケイの重い体が私を地面に押し付ける。下肢の関節が、卵の殻のようにジェットブースターを押し潰す。私はその手を振りほどき、怒号とともにダッシュで逃げ出した。背筋に不快な脱力感が走る。何か重要な部分が損傷を受けたらしい。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 那只猴子沉重的身体将我砸在地上，它的下肢关节就像碾碎蛋壳一样压碎了我的喷气助推器。我挣脱了它的束缚，尖叫着跑开了，愤怒不已。某种令人不快的虚弱感爬上了我的脊柱，应该是某处重要的器官受到了损害。
languages.original_text: The mon-keigh's heavy body pins me to the ground. The joint of its lower limb crushes the jet booster like an eggshell. I break free of the grip and dash away with an angry shriek. Unpleasant weakness creeps up my spine: something vital has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: 那只猴子沉重的身体将我砸在地上，它的下肢关节就像碾碎蛋壳一样压碎了我的喷气助推器。我挣脱了它的束缚，尖叫着跑开了，愤怒不已。某种令人讨厌的虚弱感爬上了我的脊柱，应该是某处重要的器官受到了损害。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: El pesado cuerpo {mf|del|de la} mon-keigh me retiene en el suelo. La articulación de su extremidad inferior aplasta el propulsor como si fuera una cáscara de huevo. Me libero del agarre y me alejo lanzando un grito de rabia. Una desagradable debilidad me recorre la espina dorsal: ha dañado algo vital.
languages.original_text: The mon-keigh's heavy body pins me to the ground. The joint of its lower limb crushes the jet booster like an eggshell. I break free of the grip and dash away with an angry shriek. Unpleasant weakness creeps up my spine: something vital has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: El pesado cuerpo {mf|del|de la} mon-keigh me retiene en el suelo. La articulación de su extremidad inferior aplasta el propulsor como si fuera una cáscara de huevo. Me libero del agarre y me alejo lanzando un grito de rabia. Una desagradable debilidad me recorre la espina dorsal: ha dañado algo vital.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Der schwere Körper des Chem-Pan-Sey drückt mich auf den Boden. Das Gelenk seiner unteren Gliedmaße zerbricht den Jetbooster wie eine Eierschale. Ich befreie mich von dem Griff und sprinte mit einem zornigen Kreischen weg. Eine unerfreuliche Schwäche kriecht mein Rückgrat hinauf: Etwas Lebenswichtiges wurde beschädigt.
languages.original_text: The mon-keigh's heavy body pins me to the ground. The joint of its lower limb crushes the jet booster like an eggshell. I break free of the grip and dash away with an angry shriek. Unpleasant weakness creeps up my spine: something vital has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: Der schwere Körper des Chem-Pan-Sey drückt mich auf den Boden. Das Gelenk seiner unteren Gliedmaße zerbricht den Jetbooster wie eine Eierschale. Ich befreie mich von dem Griff und sprinte mit einem zornigen Kreischen weg. Eine lähmende Schwäche kriecht mein Rückgrat hinauf: Etwas Lebenswichtiges wurde beschädigt.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Le poids {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh me cloue au sol tandis qu'{mf|il|elle} fracasse mon booster dorsal à coups de genoux. Je parviens à me libérer de son emprise et fais un bond pour m'éloigner en poussant un cri de colère, mais je ressens néanmoins une faiblesse le long de mon échine : quelque chose de vital a été endommagé.
languages.original_text: The mon-keigh's heavy body pins me to the ground. The joint of its lower limb crushes the jet booster like an eggshell. I break free of the grip and dash away with an angry shriek. Unpleasant weakness creeps up my spine: something vital has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: Le poids {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh m'entraîne jusqu'au sol tandis qu'{mf|il|elle} fracasse mon booster dorsal à coups de genoux. Je parviens à me libérer de son emprise et fais un bond pour m'éloigner, mais je ressens néanmoins une faiblesse le long de mon échine : quelque chose de vital a été endommagé.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mon-keigh'in ağır bedeni, beni yere sabitliyor. Alt uzuvlarının eklem yeri, jet iticiyi yumurta kabuğu gibi parçalıyor. Kavrayışından kurtuluyorum ve öfkeli bir feryatla geri atılıyorum. Omurgamı nahoş bir zayıflık kaplıyor: Hayati öneme sahip bir şeylerin hasar gördüğünü biliyorum.
languages.original_text: The mon-keigh's heavy body pins me to the ground. The joint of its lower limb crushes the jet booster like an eggshell. I break free of the grip and dash away with an angry shriek. Unpleasant weakness creeps up my spine: something vital has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: Mon-keigh'in ağır bedeni beni yere sabitliyor. Alt uzuvlarının eklem yeri, jet iticiyi yumurta kabuğu gibi parçalıyor. Kavrayışından kurtuluyorum ve öfkeli bir feryatla geri atılıyorum. Omurgamı nahoş bir zayıflık kaplıyor: Hayati öneme sahip bir şeyler hasar gördü.
traits.speaker: Player
